Once every 15 minutes, just TAP the screen!You can GET a variety of products Coin, Tool, items, and robots!You can customize to their liking more and more, try to toy robot life of your own! !* Please note that our users play data (level, coins, etc.), so it is initialized and initialize the data or uninstall the app.* If the application will not start up, though there are in trouble, we either restart your terminal at a time, please quit this app from Task Manager.* When contacting us, we will ask that you contact us with your Gmail address and also your phone you.

reviews.title: Super cute.
